The boxart said: "6" because its the 6th game in the musou orochi. but its the 7th game on the dynasty warriors series. musou orochi = dynasty warriors in japanese. however this game is DYNASTY WARRIOR 7. please seed.  will tell the game if its working or not if i managed to install it.
